statement_text: Then, in 2012, I was at that time on the National Science Advisory Board for Biosecurity, and we had data presented to that group [National Science Advisory Board for Biosecurity] that essentially said, ‘we’re just one mutation away from the virus becoming a major pandemic virus.’ Then, in 2012, I was at that time on the National Science Advisory Board for Biosecurity, and we had data presented to that group [National Science Advisory Board for Biosecurity] that essentially said, ‘we’re just one mutation away from the virus becoming a major pandemic virus.’ It [the virus becoming a major pandemic virus] didn’t happen.
